person.persName: Charles Julian Clarke (Franklin Co, KY, clerk & engineer, Ky National Legion, aide-de-camp & 1st lieut)

body.p: Franklin County, Kentucky, clerk, engineer, and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of Joseph Clarke. Resident of Franklin County in 1850. Household owned six enslaved persons in Franklin County in 1850. Civil engineer in Franklin County in 1860. Household owned sixteen enslaved persons in Franklin County in 1860. Engineer in Franklin county in 1863. Appointed aide-de-camp and first lieutenant for the Kentucky National Legion on March 13, 1865. Clerk for Daniel W. Lindsey in the offices of the Inspector General and Adjutant General in 1865.
